email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

Hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 85000, LOA: 225m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Cargo size is 75000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 Oct. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 Oct?

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 17-22 Oct. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Alexander Wang

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alexander,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 75000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 17-22 Oct
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 12,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Fernandez
